statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT item_id, item_name, location FROM inventory_management ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_management WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_management WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, location FROM inventory_management WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY location ASC, item_id DESC
SELECT item_name AS product, quantity AS stock FROM inventory_management WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM inventory_management
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT location, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT supplier_name, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE quantity_supplied > 100;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, quantity_supplied, delivery_date FROM supply_chain WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' OR quantity < 5 ORDER BY location, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers' AND quantity_supplied BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY supply_id
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, category FROM Product WHERE p_id = 1;
SELECT p_id, name, category FROM Product ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT sc_id, product_id, warehouse_id, quantity FROM SupplyChain WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT p_id, name FROM Product WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT p_id, name, category FROM Product WHERE category='Clothing' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p_id, name, category FROM Product WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY p_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT w_id, location, manager FROM Warehouse WHERE location LIKE '%New%';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT order_date, supplier_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, ship_date, delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE delivery_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, supplier_id, quantity, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY quantity DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory INNER JOIN orders ON inventory.id = orders.quantity ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN orders ON suppliers.id = orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE date_shipped >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT supplier_name, contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT shipment_id, item_id, quantity, date_shipped FROM shipments ORDER BY date_shipped DESC
SELECT transaction_id, warehouse_id, quantity_received, date_received FROM transactions WHERE quantity_received >= 10
